definition: to go to town/to enter a big city (to live or work)
to go forward/to advance/to go in/to enter/to put in/to submit/to take in/to admit/(math.) base of a number system/classifier for sections in a building or residential compound

sentences.english: I must be in town next Saturday.
sentences.chinese: 我下星期六一定要進城去。

sentences.english: Three is the farmer enters a city faced with surmounts "the quality barrier" with difficulty.
sentences.chinese: 三是農民進城面臨難以跨越的“素質屏障”。

sentences.english: Here he let the Enchanted Horse come to the ground, but he did not at once enter the city.
sentences.chinese: 才把馬降落在地上，但並沒有立刻進城去。

sentences.english: He went to town by a sulky .
sentences.chinese: 他乘單座二輪馬車進城了。

sentences.english: She rushed to town that very night.
I felt like a rube but nobody discriminated me.
sentences.chinese: 覺得自己像個鄉巴佬進城，卻沒人歧視我。

sentences.english: A city Laonongganzhao donkey, donkey Chuanghong Deng, fined 10 yuan.
sentences.chinese: 一老農趕著毛驢進城，驢闖紅燈，罰10元。

sentences.english: When the old granny first came to the city, she goggled at the size of the buildings.
sentences.chinese: 當老太太初次進城時，她瞪大眼睛盯住那一座座高樓。

sentences.english: Let me motor you to town.
I'll have Lige bring it back when he goes to town next week.
sentences.chinese: 下週利格進城時我讓他帶回來。

sentences.english: Qianjiang City endeavored to improve the employment environment for rural workers in cities.
sentences.chinese: 潛江市着力改善農民進城就業環境。

sentences.english: You know who was in town this weekend, went to a Yankee game?
sentences.chinese: 你們知道今天誰進城看洋基隊比賽了嗎？

sentences.english: The man it is rural registered permanent residence, single into the city, not wealthy but able set.
sentences.chinese: 男方當初是農村戶口，單身進城開店，不富裕但能幹。

sentences.english: "You do not go to town on horseback, do you?" added Sir John.
sentences.chinese: 炷“你不會騎着馬進城吧？”約翰爵士接着問。

sentences.english: I felt like a rube but nobody discriminated me.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得自己像個鄉巴佬進城，但沒人歧視我。

sentences.english: It would be easier for them to hobble to town with a broken leg than with a broken pantaloon .
sentences.chinese: 寧可跛了一條腿進城，他們也不肯穿着破褲子去。

definition: population (counted as number of households for census or taxation)/registered residence/residence permit/(in Hong Kong and Macau) bank account
to demolish a building and relocate the inhabitants
to return to one's home town
to provide for the elderly (family members)/to enjoy a life in retirement
